about_the_game:
Move through the board of life and make the optimal decisions that maximise your health, wealth, social life and career. The game uses a combination of strategy and luck that allows you to land on the squares that you most need (boost your mental health) and avoid those that are most dangerous.

Choose your career and become a painter, a chef, a lawyer... But do not forget to take care of your physical and mental health, your friends, family and significant other.

Life is like a box of chocolates and you never know what you are going to get. In this game you battle against the events that life throws at you ( a global pandemic, an economic crisis ... ), using the gifts that life gave you ( intelligence, resilience, empathy ... ), and the luck of the draw for the given year. With the end goal of having a fulfilled, long and happy life.

- 14 parameters to optimize
- 2500+ cards to create a unique board every game
- 10+ professions
- 200+ choice cards
- 20+ global events
- 30 lingering effects
- pets to look after
- a store where you can buy yourself some happiness

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: M1/i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with macOS 12
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: M1/i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with macOS 12
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Walks Of Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: This is a life sim board game where the board represents one year of your life. Through luck and strategy you must avoid landing on negative squares and strategize on how to optimize your four core life parameters - health, social life, career and wealth.
